The US tracks oil tanker movements via satellite to monitor countries buying Russian oil.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trumps-25-additional-tariff-on-india-what-are-secondary-tariffs-and-how-do-they-differ-from-secondary-sanctions-explained/articleshow/123161198.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trumps-25-additional-tariff-on-india-what-are-secondary-tariffs-and-how-do-they-differ-from-secondary-sanctions-explained/articleshow/123161198.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 13:48:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38246" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123161610,imgsize-38246.cms"/></item><item><title>'If India doesn’t matter to them ...': Tharoor calls for 50% tariff on US</title><description><![CDATA[Speaking about the potential impact of 50 per cent US tariffs, Tharoor remarked, "It will have an impact because we have trade of about $90 billion. Police Commissioner A Saravana Sundar has ordered an investigation and departmental action.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/coimbatore/coimbatore-shocker-chased-by-25-men-60-year-old-found-dead-at-police-station-entered-to-seek-protection/articleshow/123154801.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/coimbatore/coimbatore-shocker-chased-by-25-men-60-year-old-found-dead-at-police-station-entered-to-seek-protection/articleshow/123154801.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 08:40:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34796" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154824,imgsize-34796.cms"/></item><item><title>Biohacking to live forever: Bryan Johnson’s anti-ageing experiment stuns internet; Know his routine</title><description><![CDATA[Bryan Johnson, known for his anti-aging efforts, has added methylene blue to his routine. This remark drew criticism from opposition parties, who deemed it insensitive amidst the suffering of flood-affected residents.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kanpur/ganga-at-your-doorstep-to-wash-your-feet-up-minister-sanjay-nishads-flood-remark-draws-flak-opposition-calls-it-insult-to-suffering-faith/articleshow/123153802.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kanpur/ganga-at-your-doorstep-to-wash-your-feet-up-minister-sanjay-nishads-flood-remark-draws-flak-opposition-calls-it-insult-to-suffering-faith/articleshow/123153802.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 07:14:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="875061" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123153852,imgsize-875061.cms"/></item><item><title>Behind closed doors: Trump and Miller's secret push to shut out international students</title><description><![CDATA[Through coercive legal settlements and immigration policy shifts, the Trump administration—spearheaded by Stephen Miller—is compelling U.S. universities to scale back international student enrollment. A recent agreement with Columbia University signals a strategic push to diminish America's academic globalism. Despite economic and demographic evidence favoring international education, ideology now threatens to override logic, innovation, and institutional autonomy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/behind-closed-doors-how-trump-and-miller-are-rewriting-us-higher-education-to-shut-out-international-students/articleshow/123130077.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/behind-closed-doors-how-trump-and-miller-are-rewriting-us-higher-education-to-shut-out-international-students/articleshow/123130077.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 06:38:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TRISHA TEWARI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49914" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123130110,imgsize-49914.cms"/></item><item><title>Sturgeon Moon 2025: When and where to watch the rare 2-night full Moon</title><description><![CDATA[In August 2025, the Sturgeon Moon offers a rare spectacle, gracing the sky on two consecutive evenings. This full moon, named for the abundance of sturgeon fish, aligns with Shravana Purnima in India and will be visible post-sunset on August 8 and 9. Skywatchers in North America can witness stunning moonrises during twilight, with similar timings on both nights.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/etimes/trending/sturgeon-moon-2025-when-and-where-to-watch-the-rare-2-night-full-moon-and-why-is-it-special/articleshow/123156314.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/etimes/trending/sturgeon-moon-2025-when-and-where-to-watch-the-rare-2-night-full-moon-and-why-is-it-special/articleshow/123156314.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 10:22:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TRENDING DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19996" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123156341,imgsize-19996.cms"/></item><item><title>Durand Cup | 'We're called Bangladeshi...' — EB fans deliver a stinging message</title><description><![CDATA[During a Durand Cup match, East Bengal fans protested against the branding of Bengali as a 'Bangladeshi language'. This followed West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee's strong condemnation of Delhi Police for using the term in an official letter.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/for-speaking-our-mother-tongue-were-called-bangladeshi-east-bengal-fans-deliver-a-stinging-message-to-the-government/articleshow/123155914.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/for-speaking-our-mother-tongue-were-called-bangladeshi-east-bengal-fans-deliver-a-stinging-message-to-the-government/articleshow/123155914.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 10:06:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="95094" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123156075,imgsize-95094.cms"/></item><item><title>Dharmasthala mass burial probe: 4 YouTubers assaulted after clash with locals</title><description><![CDATA[In Dharmasthala, tensions flared as YouTubers covering the SIT exhumation in the alleged mass burials case were assaulted by locals, resulting in minor injuries. Police intervened with a mild lathicharge to control the situation. FIRs are being registered following complaints from YouTubers and a counter-complaint regarding an assault on a reporter.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mangaluru/dharmasthala-mass-burial-probe-4-youtubers-assaulted-after-clash-with-locals-hospitalised/articleshow/123154036.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mangaluru/dharmasthala-mass-burial-probe-4-youtubers-assaulted-after-clash-with-locals-hospitalised/articleshow/123154036.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 07:33:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="70660" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154081,imgsize-70660.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump asked why India singled out over Russian oil? His 'secondary sanctions' warning</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst deepening India-Russia oil ties, President Trump has escalated sanctions against New Delhi by imposing an additional 25% tariff, bringing the total to 50%. India's external affairs ministry swiftly condemned the increase as unfair and unreasonable, emphasizing that its oil imports are driven by energy security needs. Trump also hinted at potential secondary sanctions against China for similar actions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/its-only-been-8-hours-trump-threatens-to-impose-secondary-sanctions-on-india-hints-at-possible-ban-on-china/articleshow/123152597.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/its-only-been-8-hours-trump-threatens-to-impose-secondary-sanctions-on-india-hints-at-possible-ban-on-china/articleshow/123152597.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 06:04:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44420" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154308,imgsize-44420.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

       <link><![CDATA[https://www.ndtvprofit.com/markets/trump-tariff-hike-nilesh-shah-says-fatal-to-be-us-friend]]></link>

      <description><![CDATA[The GenAI ecosystem in India now comprises over 890 startups, growing 3.7 times in the past year. But, India lags significantly behind global peers in terms of funding.       <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/ongc-share-price-reliance-share-price-and-bp-sign-joint-operating-agreement-for-offshore-block-in-saurashtra-basin-19644863.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[ONGC has been designated as the operator for the block, and the consortium will now undertake exploration activities to assess and tap the hydrocarbon potential of the region. Shares of Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Ltd ended at ₹240.10, down by ₹0.100 or 0.042%, on the BSE today (July 28).]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[GAIL Q1 Results | Net profit falls 31%, misses estimates; ₹5,000-cr LPG pipeline expansion cleared]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/gail-india-share-price-q1fy26-results-net-profit-falls-revenue-ebitda-margins-below-street-forecast-capex-lpg-expansion-cleared-19644847.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Revenue came in at ₹34,768 crore for the April-June quarter, slightly above the CNBC-TV18 poll estimate of ₹34,474 crore. The EBITDA and operating margin figures were marginally below Street projections. Shares of GAIL (India) Ltd ended at ₹180.45, down by ₹3.10 or 1.69%, on the BSE today (July 28).]]></description>
